update coupon_investor
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update coupon_investor set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_investor (id, code, name, remarks, status, created_by, created_by_name, created ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.code, a.name, a.remarks, a.status, b.percent,b.ids,b.names,b.investor_type from coupon_investor a left join coupon_investor_detail b on a.id = b.investor_id and a.id =#{id} and a.status = 1
mapper.update: update coupon_investor set status = 1 , update_by = #{userId}, updated_by_name = #{userName}, updated = now() where id = #{id}

update coupon_investor set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_by_name = #{updatedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
